body.name: Mini Mop LEJIEYIN Portable Squeeze Mop Hand Wash-Free Strongly Absorbent Small Sponge Mop Easily Dry with 2 Refill Sponges Wringing for Kitchen/Bathroom/Living Room/Desktop/Glass，1 Year Warranty…
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 44 mins
features: 【PORTABLE MINI MOPA】Small Mop shrinkage size is 8.85in*1.77in, Small size and light weight are perfect for cleaning in small spaces.Sponge mop with hanging design, easy to store, does not take up space.

【NO HAND WASH MOP】Self squeeze mini mop washing and dewatering in one,Ring-shaped push-pull design,Folded 180° strong squeeze,One-handed pulling and squeezing quickly wrings out excess water from the mop head,Keeps hands dry,Makes cleaning more efficient.

【WET and DRY SPONGE】Kitchen mop with biodegradable environmental cotton head,Strong adsorption ability for fine dust and small particles,Abrasion-resistant, breathable, acid-resistant, Wet mop for kitchen, floor, glass, desktop, one wipe clean.

【INSTALLATION and DISASSEMBLY】Installation：Align the mop head with the mop slot，Push the left mop head to the left, push the right mop head to the right, both sides hear the click sound, installation is complete.Disassembly：Lift up the middle of the mop head, while the left mop head to the right slightly force and shake, pull it out, the right mop head needs to be slightly force to the left and shake, pull it out.

【PLEASE MESSAGE US 】If you have any questions or concerns about the mini glass cleaner, please contact us for free on the ordering page, we promise to give you a satisfactory solution.We endeavor to make our customers happy, and would appreciate the opportunity to rectify any issues that may occur.

productInformation.value: #147,882 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #18 in Household Sponge Mops

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use a lot of paper towels and this has cut down on our paper towel use by a ton! It’s great with cleaning our counters and doing surface cleaning around the house. And it comes with 2 pads so you can throw one in the wash and continue using the other one. This is very practical and works great for its intended use. My only critique is that it can be a bit stiff at times when you try to squeeze out the water but it does what it needs to do!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy it it’s a piece of crap
reviews.reviewText: Before I can even figure out how to get the mopheads to stay on, I noticed that when I bent it in half, it was already starting to come apart. It looks like creases in the photo, but it actually is a little tears as well of the mop head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Little hard to squeeze shut once it is dried while open, but I thought it would need to be open to dry not closed!! It was perfect for cleaning cabinets though and small areas! I also thought it came with 2 sponges but it did not

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a nifty mini mop that is easy to use on table top surfaces and countertops. We bought this to help get our kids involved in cleaning and this is the perfect size for them. The trigger is a little tough to pull up but over all it does the job. I wouldn’t suggest using this to mop your floors as it would take a few days. But for small top surfaces easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and is super simple
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a simple mini-mop addition to make cleaning my sink and shower.Overall, I am pretty happy with it, not only was it a cheap grab, but it was easy to clean after the fact.Soap and water makes this tool an elite combo, no complaints, and it works without issue. The build quality itself isn't anything amazing, but it doesn't feel particularly cheap either. I think it's a bit unreasonable to have that be a major complaint considering the low price point compared to similar products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars MINI MOP does not live up at all to it's description. Not able to attach sponge to plastic handle
reviews.reviewText: i was unable to install the sponges to the plastic handle. they do not fit on the plastic handle. i am unable to use this and had to throw it away. it's a great idea but this one is worthless. i would not advise to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't drain all the way when ringing out but absorbs a lot and great picking up messes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Self squeezing squeegee!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This squeegee has become an every day item for me while at work. There is constantly the need to wipe of the bar top while at work, and this squeegee makes everything easier. It eliminates the need for another rag to dry off the bar, plus it fit inside my apron pocket. This mini mop is worth every cent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the way it soaks up water, I use it in the bathroom after having a shower.
Ich habe mir dadurch beim säubern meiner Duschkabine eine Erleichterung versprochen, das Gegenteil ist der Fall. Absoluter Floppy, rausgeschmissenes Geld.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: An hour of my life I won’t get back trying to fit the pad! Video or no video I couldn’t get it on so went into the bin !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Not as handy as the the video makes out
reviews.reviewText: The item itself is a wee bit light-weight but was built ok. Applying the sponge to the actual mini mop was a bit of a trial but got there and the it seems to be a wee bit shorter in length then I thought. However we purchased it for use in our shower enclosure to dry off the shower tray and tiles and glass which it is OK at but not quite how I thought it would perform. There's absolutely nothing wrong with it, but probably expected a bit more from it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: works for dusting or wiping wet spills
reviews.reviewText: I have to leave mine open after use otherwise it can become smelly of wet.Found it quite hard to attach the sponge.
